world

study meditative

emotionally growing in that way

correspond to the three dimensions of
the soul on the conscious level
the nephesh is action
doing an actual act of kindness
helping someone volunteering

developing them character development

your mindset
looking at things with a fresh

the microcosm of the entire universe

to not just cope but to thrive

to these three pillars a time for study
cognitive conditioning a time for
emotions
prayer and a time for action
